content.body: FYI Richard Gibson ryzokuken Romulo Cintra and others: Mark Davis made a PR to clarify the UAX 29 conformance rules in response to our conversation last week. See here: https://github.com/unicode-org/unicode-reports/pull/40

FYI Richard Gibson ryzokuken Romulo Cintra and others: Mark Davis made a PR to clarify the UAX 29 conformance rules in response to our conversation last week. See here: https://github.com/unicode-org/unicode-reports/pull/40

content.body: oops, it must be a private repo. The gist of the change is to adopt conformance text more similar to that found in UAX 31: https://www.unicode.org/reports/tr31/#R1
